# Iowa Ethics and Campaign Disclosure Board {.unnumbered}

## Source
[Iowa Ethics and Campaign Disclosure Board](https://data.iowa.gov/Campaigns-Elections/Iowa-Campaign-Contributions-Received/smfg-ds7h/about_data)

## Brief Description

Political candidates for state offices submit campaign contribution data to the Iowa Ethics and Campaign Disclosure Board, which makes the data publicly available for download. For this project, individual contribution data for the years 2020 to 2024 was downloaded, aggregated by city, and cleaned by city names to match with other city datasets.

## Measures

### Iowa political contributions per adult (Political)
This measure is the total federal political contributions in a community divided by the total number of adults in a community.
